about_the_game: Dive into 'The Unknown Strain,' a captivating 3D adventure set in a richly detailed low poly world brimming with mystery and magic. As the hero, Ashe, you'll explore diverse landscapes from mystical forests to ancient ruins in the mountains, each with its own unique challenges and secrets. Acquire magical abilities to battle all kind of enemy's left behind by this mysterious disease. Explore the world to find clues that will lead you closer to uncovering the truth behind the unknown strain threatening your world. With dynamic gameplay, engaging storylines, and a visually stunning environment, We invite you the player on an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape the fate of the realm. Prepare to embark on an action-adventure journey where every discovery expands on the lore of your mysterious roots.

With dynamic gameplay, engaging storylines, and a visually stunning environment, We invite you the player on an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape the fate of the realm. name: The Unknown Strain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.

short_description: Embark on an epic journey where magic meets mystery in a vibrant world. Uncover ancient secrets, battle mystical creatures, and explore breathtaking landscapes. Your adventure begins now! Will you unravel the truths that are hidden behind family secrets?
